info.name: Impulse Yellow Theme - Pokemon Showdown
info.description: I have created this theme for Flame Savior Server! in my free time. Feel free to use it on your server as long as you use it under the License. If you have any suggestions, questions, bug reports or criticism, feel free to let me know here or on showdown! You can find me on Wisp & Flame Savior server under Prince Sky.
info.additionalInfo: 5/6/2016 ● Updated Battle Backdrops to XY & ORAS. (Backdrops By: 13ulbasaur) ● Updated Weather Backdrops. (Weather Backdrops By: 13ulbasaur) 4/6/2016 ● Updated Battle CSS. ● Screens Added.
